    • Method Detail

      • removeBlock

        public void removeBlock(Block b)
        . removeBlock removes a block of the player's hand if this player has more than 0 blocks and owns the block
        Parameters:
        b - the block to be removed from the hand
        Throws:
        HandEmptyException - if the player's hand is empty
        BlockNotInHandException - if the player doesn't have block b
